formattedAddress: 101 W 91st St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 101 W 91st St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text:
Etienne has arranged for my 11 years old son 1-1 training with Coach Cheikh during our vacation in NY. Etienne has communicated with me in a responsive, solution oriented and collaborative manner and followed up the trainings.
We were so lucky to train with Coach Cheikh. He’s a great coach, wonderful person and definitely knows how to communicate and get along with kids. He’s also explaining why the player needs to do what in which circumstances and I really see the sparkles lightning in my son‘s eyes while listening Cheikh. He also gives motivational speech and shares his experience during trainings and I cannot thank enough for his valuable tips and life lessons during and after sessions.
Overall working with Infinite Athletics was a smooth process for me and great experience for my son. I recommend Etienne and Coach Cheikh for parents looking for a basketball coach in NY.

originalText.text:
My son has attended summer camp with Infinite Athletics (IA) for two summers now. Coach Brower runs a very professional organization and works to make players excel and push themselves when playing basketball. But Coach Brower’s goal is always for the kids to enjoy their time playing basketball and teach them respect for the game and respect for each other. Coach Brower is very good at providing feedback both to the kids and to the parents. I truly feels he cares about the trajectory of each student/athlete.

My son has so enjoyed his camp sessions and wishes he could do them all summer long. I noticed a marked improvement in my son’s basketball skills after his time at Camp this year.

My son has also done private sessions with IA.  I can’t say enough good things about IA, Coach Brower, and their coaching staff.

originalText.text: My daughter and son spent a week at Infiinite Athletics basketball camp.  They had a great time and learned a lot.  Organization and communication by the camp staff was excellent. Thank you!

originalText.text: We reached out to Etienne to request a small group for our 3rd grade girls. He was terrific in helping us put one together and get us a coach. Etienne was so communicative throughout the season and the girls enjoyed the experience. Coaches were great.

originalText.text: My teenage son has trained with Etienne and Infinite Athletics for two offseasons now and they are outstanding.  My son works on strength and conditioning for baseball and football.  Etienne has a great rapport with his young athletes, he's flexible and easy to work with and is extremely knowledgeable and motivating.  He's a great role model for young athletes and I would refer him without hesitation.
